Articles.Content:
Hi this is my first manned mun landing not as hard as I thought it would be compared to my first docking I do have mechjeb on the lander but didn't use and forgot to put ASAS but it was fun and rewarding to land a kerbal on the mun and here are some screenshots including refueling with my station

http://imageshack.us/a/img21/417/screenshot2dda.png

http://imageshack.us/a/img832/8629/screenshot5kq.png

http://imageshack.us/a/img707/9196/screenshot4ebm.png

http://imageshack.us/a/img202/8618/screenshot0mpf.png

http://imageshack.us/a/img69/2581/screenshot02c.png
Good job, my first landing wasn't nearly as smooth as this.
Well done, your first Mun landing is a great memory.

Good job, my first landing wasn't nearly as smooth as this.

Thanks my first attempt didn't end so well lander on its side loads of pieces every were it's not a proper landing because two of the legs were missing and bring on its side and all.
Congratulations. It's one of the nicest feelings in the game.

Nice landing and nice looking lander!

I based my craft on Russian space vehicles.
Where did you get the spherical capsule from?

Where did you get the spherical capsule from?

It's the Stayputnik probe core.
Nice! Take note of that spot, you may want to visit again one day!

Hi this is my first manned mun landing not as hard as I thought it would be compared to my first docking I do have mechjeb on the lander but didn't use and forgot to put ASAS but it was fun and rewarding to land a kerbal on the mun and here are some screenshots including refueling with my station

http://imageshack.us/a/img21/417/screenshot2dda.png

http://imageshack.us/a/img832/8629/screenshot5kq.png

http://imageshack.us/a/img707/9196/screenshot4ebm.png

http://imageshack.us/a/img202/8618/screenshot0mpf.png

http://imageshack.us/a/img69/2581/screenshot02c.png

Lol, in the last picture the kerbal is like 'OMG I'M STANDING ON THA MOON GUYSS!!!!!!!!!!!'

Well done, better than mine. I needed to do a follow up rescue mission for mine which ended up needing a follow up rescue mission

Gotta love KSP.

G.
I don't think my lander has enough fuel to get back to kerbin and there is the out of fuel booster section with a kerbol inside.
